item.title: Creating BashBunny Payloads
item.description: What is it? The BashBunny is an attack platform that allows attackers to create payloads in Bash. The device can be scripted to enumerate as a HID (keyboard), mass storage, serial, and Ethernet. This enables a multitude of attacks including thing like exfiltrating documents over a network interface or stealing account hashes from locked computers. Creating a Payload We want to create a payload that allows for easy exfiltration from macOS.
